column3: Roseline needs an adventurer to destroy diremite eggs.

Roseline recently discovered two clutches of diremite eggs by the Matron's Lethe. However, despite being a battle-tested Wood Wailer, she is repulsed by the mere sight of the eggs. Seek out and destroy the two clutches of eggs.
You slay the unborn diremites and their enraged parents. Tell Roseline that the task is complete.
Roseline is grateful for your willingness to dirty your hands, and laments that she cannot always rely on such timely help.
Your willingness to assist the residents of the Twelveswood is commendable. If you have a moment, mayhap you can assist me with a delicate matter?

My duties as a Wood Wailer include inspecting the Matron's Lethe for signs of damage or decay. It's never been a difficult task─until the other day, when I discovered several clutches of diremite eggs.
I've no problem slaying the beasts when full-grown, but the mere sight of their eggs <Emphasis>sickens</Emphasis> me. Spare me this disgusting task and destroy the eggs.
Would that I could always rely on a kind soul to handle such tasks!
My training prepared me to face beasts in combat, and not once have I shirked that duty. But to lay hands upon those sticky, slimy eggs is just─
Well, clearly you have no problems doing so. Thank you for your help, adventurer.
A diremite rushes to the defense of the eggs!
